thread.title: Spaulding Turnpike Exit off-ramp scheduled to open
thread.title_full: Spaulding Turnpike Exit off-ramp scheduled to open - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Spaulding Turnpike Exit off-ramp scheduled to open
text:
NEWINGTON, N.H. (AP) - The New Hampshire Department of Transportation says the new Exit 3 southbound off-ramp of the Spaulding Turnpike in Newington is set to open.
The ramp is scheduled to open on Friday, a day later than previously announced. It will allow traffic to exit and head east across a new bridge to get to Woodbury Avenue and the malls.
The old left exit ramp was closed on July 7 while the new ramp, bridge and additional tie-in roadwork were under construction.
Restrictions will remain in place until later this fall on other Exit 3 ramps.
